@@ -0,0 +1,23 @@
+# Issue
+
+## Description
+
+<!-- Please describe the reason for your changes -->
+
+-
+
+## Changelog
+
+### Added
+
+### Changed
+
+### Deprecated
+
+### Removed
+
+### Fixed
+
+### Security
+
+### Uncategorized

@@ -1,18 +0,0 @@
-name: Release
-on:
-  pull_request:
-    types: [closed]
-
-jobs:
-  send-changelog:
-    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
-    name: "Upload Changelog"
-    steps:
-      - name: Upload PR Changelog
-        if: github.event.payload.pull_request.merged
-        uses: schul-cloud/PR-Changelog-Sender@master
-        with:

-          mongo-db: "pr-changelog"
-          mongo-collection: "pr-changes"
-          changelog-sections: '["Added", "Changed", "Deprecated", "Removed", "Fixed", "Security", "Uncategorized"]'

@@ -1,7 +1,8 @@
 name: Release
 on:
   release:
-    types: [published]
+    # types: [published]
+    types: [created, edited, published]
 
 jobs:
   generate-changelog:
@@ -11,8 +12,7 @@ jobs:
       - name: generate changelog
         uses: schul-cloud/PR-Changelog-Generator@master
         with:
-          gh-token: ${{ secrets.SC_BOT_GITHUB_TOKEN }}
-          mongo-uri: ${{ secrets.MONGO_URI }}
-          mongo-db: "pr-changelog"
-          mongo-collection: "pr-changes"
+          token: ${{ secrets.SC_BOT_GITHUB_TOKEN }}
           changelog-sections: '["Added", "Changed", "Deprecated", "Removed", "Fixed", "Security", "Uncategorized"]'
+        env:
+          ACTIONS_STEP_DEBUG: true

@@ -1,25 +0,0 @@

-
-on:

-  release:

-jobs:

-        uses: ./
-        with:

-          mongo-uri: ${{ secrets.MONGO_URI }}
-          mongo-db: "pr-changelog"
-          mongo-collection: "pr-changes"
-          changelog-sections: '["Added", "Changed", "Deprecated", "Removed", "Fixed", "Security", "Uncategorized"]'

@@ -1,26 +1,16 @@
 # PR Changelog Generator - GitHub Action
 
-A GitHub Action to generate a changelog based on MongoDB date created by the PR Changelog Sender.
+A GitHub Action to generate a changelog based on a Changelog Section in Pull Requests.
 
 ## Inputs
 
-### `mongo-uri`
+### `token`
 
 **Required:** true
 
-**Description:** The URL to the MongoDB to push new changes introduced by pull requests to.
+**Description:** A Personal Access Token to access the repo. You can also use the `GITHUB_TOKEN` provided by the execution context. This Token needs read access to the current repository.
 
-**Example:** `mongodb+srv://<username>:<password>@<your-cluster-url>`
-
-### `mongo-db` - default: `pr-changelog`
-
-The database name that should be used.
-
-### `mongo-collection`
-
-**Default:** `pr-changes`
-
-The collection name in the database that should be used.
+**Example:** `${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}`
 
 ### `changelog-sections`
 
@@ -30,26 +20,23 @@ The sections by that changes should be grouped for the release.
 
 ## Example Usage
 
-### Action
-
 ```yaml
-name: Test
+name: Release
 on:
   release:
-    types: [published]
+    # types: [published]
+    types: [created, edited, published]
 
 jobs:
-  pr-changelog-generator:
+  generate-changelog:
     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
-    name: "PR Changelog Generator"
+    name: Generate Changelog
     steps:
-      - uses: actions/checkout@v1
-      - name: Push PR Changelog
-        uses: schul-cloud/actions-pull-changelog@master
+      - name: generate changelog
+        uses: schul-cloud/PR-Changelog-Generator@master
         with:
-          mongo-uri: ${{ secrets.MONGO_URI }}
-          mongo-db: "pr-changelog"
-          mongo-collection: "pr-changes"
-          changelog-sections:
-            ["Added", "Changed", "Deprecated", "Removed", "Fixed", "Security"]
+          token: ${{ secrets.SC_BOT_GITHUB_TOKEN }}
+          changelog-sections: '["Added", "Changed", "Deprecated", "Removed", "Fixed", "Security", "Uncategorized"]'
+        # env:
+        #   ACTIONS_STEP_DEBUG: true
 ```

@@ -4,7 +4,7 @@ branding:
   icon: "edit"
   color: "gray-dark"
 inputs:
-  gh-token:
+  token:
     description: "Token is required to get the list of associated PRs for the current release"
     required: true
   mongo-uri:

@@ -0,0 +1,3 @@
+# Example-Data
+
+This directory contains some example github api responses that you can use a reference during development.

@@ -1,7 +1,7 @@
 {
 	"name": "pr-changelog-generator",
-	"version": "0.0.2",
-	"description": "A GitHub Action to generate a Changelog from schul-cloud/pr-changelog-sender mongodb entries",
+	"version": "0.0.3",
+	"description": "A GitHub Action to generate a changelog based on a Changelog Section in Pull Requests.",
 	"main": "index.js",
 	"scripts": {
 		"build": "ncc build index.js -o dist"

 		"@actions/github": "^2.1.1",

-		"mongodb": "^3.5.5"
+		"compare-versions": "^3.6.0"
 	},
 	"devDependencies": {
 		"@zeit/ncc": "^0.22.1",
